column4: with virtualbox, i am confused.. is it one machine running 2 versions of an OS at the sametime, or does it connect remotely to another windows box bringing it local?
i am unsure if you can get starcraft 2 and company of heroes running under ubuntu.  Hey, at least it is not wow right lol
Some have reported that Starcraft works well under Playonlinux: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=878051
